scripts.fix:ver1: jq '.version = $newVal' --arg newVal `jq -r '.version' package.json` ../package.json > tmp.$$.json && mv -f tmp.$$.json ../package.json
scripts.fix:ver2: jq '.version = $newVal' --arg newVal `jq -r '.version' package.json` ../package.rlib.json > tmp.$$.json && mv -f tmp.$$.json ../package.rlib.json
scripts.git:all: yarn git:add && git commit -m 'Publish' && yarn git:tag && git push && git push --tags
scripts.message: echo && echo 'IGNORE THE NEXT ERROR MESSAGE (cannot prevent npm from running git)' && echo
scripts.postpublish: yarn fix:ver1 && yarn fix:ver2 && yarn git:all && yarn message
